body:
After SOFTWARE-2642 is in, something like that would be a Python one-liner:
```
import sys, osgbuild.fetch_sources; osgbuild.fetch_sources.fetch(sys.argv[1])
```
Edit: uh-oh.
```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/u/m/a/matyas/bin/fetchsources", line 5, in <module>
    osgbuild.fetch_sources.fetch(sys.argv[1])
  File "/u/m/a/matyas/vdt/software/build/osgbuild/fetch_sources.py", line 213, in fetch
    for fname in process_dot_source(cache_prefix, src, destdir):
  File "/u/m/a/matyas/vdt/software/build/osgbuild/fetch_sources.py", line 102, in process_dot_source
    filename = process_meta_url(line, destdir)
  File "/u/m/a/matyas/vdt/software/build/osgbuild/fetch_sources.py", line 37, in process_meta_url
    raise Error("Only 'git'-type URLs are understood: %s" % line)
osgbuild.error.Error: Only 'git'-type URLs are understood: osg-build/1.9.0/osg-build-1.9.0.tar.gz
```
